wikipedia_page.main: Philip Smith is an Ulster Unionist Party politician from Northern Ireland. Smith was first elected as an MLA for Strangford in the 2016 assembly election. However, he was not reelected in the following 2017 assembly election when the Strangford consistency reduced its seats from six to five. Smith now works for Queen's University Belfast.

response: *Philip Smith (VC) (1829–1906), Irish recipient of the Victoria Cross
*Philip Smith, Baron Smith of Hindhead (born 1966), Conservative member of the British House of Lords
*Philip Smith (Northern Ireland politician) (born 1967), member of the Northern Ireland Assembly
*Philip Smith (producer), New Zealand film and television producer and writer
*Philip Smith (born 1988), founder of the Friends of the British Overseas Territories
